subject: CreateProcess Errors in AllTests
msgSnippet: I just started looking at JUnit yesterday.  I am running in VAJava 3.5 on Windows NT sp6a. I run the junit.test.AllTests and got the following output. Any help
messageBody:
I just started looking at JUnit yesterday.  I am running in VAJava 3.5 on Windows NT sp6a.
 
I run the junit.test.AllTests and got the following output.
 
Any help on why I am getting these createProcess errors?
 
Randy Cox
CCSI
 
-----
...............................................E.E.E
Time: 5.218
 
FAILURES!!!
Test Results:
Run: 49 Failures: 0 Errors: 3
There were 3 errors:
1) testSuccess(junit.tests.TextRunnerTest)
java.io.IOException: CreateProcess: d:\VAJava\ide\program\bin\java -cp . junit.textui.TestRunner junit.tests.Success  error=3
